post.body: Weak points in that they never seem to persuade people, yeah. Guess that means they're ineffective for people today. Blarg.
Caught fire as in spontaneously combusted? Arson? Curling iron left plugged into the cigarette lighter? :)
Yeah we buy stuff when it goes on sale, and then say "Merry Christmas in ___ months!" :)
Another convert! :) Spread the word!
cbs.com has the videos, as does youtube: http://is.gd/aEhM (see playlist on right for the rest of season 1)
cbs.com has the videos, as does youtube: http://is.gd/aEhM (see playlist on right for the rest of season 1)
How did you first hear about it? I never watch TV so I didn't hear of it at all until I saw it recommended on survivalblog.com
You're watching it too, now? Awesome. I just finished the series today - my adrenaline is still pumping.
Yeah I think maybe 2% in our stake had any kind of good water storage. If that.
I made it in just as the cops closed it down. I had to turn around and take frontage up around Cabelas and into Trav Mtn.
Be sure to have him tell you about the latest book he's reading. Entertaining stuff. :)
No idea, haven't seen many results other than a few highlights that didn't include the RP-inspired questions...
Be careful going 90 on the new 80 :) http://www.ksl.com/?nid=148&sid=5241169
Budgeting isn't as easy when you don't have your own money tree http://is.gd/9ZEu I'm from CA originally and yeah, it's a mess.
That's a topic I love to research in personal study. My wife gets tired of it though, so our comp. study has to be different :-P
Haven't heard of him - looking at his books on Amazon now. Thx for the tip.
What's the URL to the top list?
This, close to AF ctr. street, is backing things up for miles: http://tinyurl.com/99ehn8
"Non-lethal" tasers have killed 400 in 7 years: http://tinyurl.com/5fk9ak
God bless this man for standing up over and over again: http://tinyurl.com/6y25na
Blogged: "The Physics of Perfection" http://is.gd/bF0P
Iraqi journalist hurls his shoes at Pres. Bush. http://bit.ly/l0g9 (h/t @jeremyhanks) - I would have preferred a cream pie...
The "Parowan Prophet"? Got a chuckle out of this: http://is.gd/bCKy
My wife and I aren't getting each other Christmas presents. We buy enough stuff as it is, we don't need an excuse to get more junk.
Another friday evening passes, which means...? More bank failures announced! http://www.fdic.gov/bank/individual/failed/banklist.html
Just realized I hadn't looked at the news all day long. That is very, very uncharacteristic of me. Hmm.
40 inspirational speeches in 2 minutes: http://tinyurl.com/5aljk4
My cell phone is more powerful than the laptop I brought to college.
Wanting to buy Jericho on DVD for my parents for Christmas. Too expensive, esp. when it's free online.
Just finished putting together my mini bugout bag to keep in my new office: http://tinyurl.com/5l6ue3
Hello, Phoenix. Time to see if our dog will get along with the in- laws' dog.
There is snow south of Flagstaff, AZ. Just finally got out of it. Mmm, sun...
Checking out the weather to see if we should leave this AM for AZ. Looking good, so far...
Shoveling driveways sucks.
Who's going to listen to this guy on economic matters? http://tinyurl.com/3s8jgl Go home, Biden.
http://commuterlink.utah.gov/ - that is a TON of red and yellow. It's bad out there...
Home. Getting up the mountain was a doozie. Too poor to get 4WD, ugh.
Traffic at the point of the mountain is at a crawl. Good thing it's my exit!
Hit a wall of snow at Univ. Pkwy in Orem. Yuck.
Heading home early to avoid a worse drive. This should be fun.
http://commuterlink.utah.gov is getting pounded. Everybody wants to see the damage.
One more thing to add to my "hmmm..." file. http://rawstory.com/rawreplay/?p=2642
Excited for 2081: http://www.finallyequal.com
INCREDIBLY cool Apple ad on http://cnet.com (you gotta play it)
Blogged: "The Lowest Common Denominator" http://is.gd/cz9r
Listening to Pres. Packer's latest conf. talk. The Lord always prepares a safe way ahead in troubled times - good counsel for these times.
I wish I was back in Africa. I miss their genuineness, sincerity, and unashamed love of God. Such good people..
So communism is kosher, but you're crying over "vulgar content"? http://is.gd/eHlD Pot, meet kettle.
No surprise here: Henry Kissinger calls on Obama to create a "New World Order". http://tinyurl.com/9mrdre Crazy globalists!
"Everybody knows Social Security is a big Ponzi scheme" - Ron Paul http://tinyurl.com/8ngyez God bless this man.
Trying to find a good/new system for a thematic study of the Book of Mormon. Thoughts?
Largest US embassy in the world is now open in -- you guessed it -- Iraq. http://is.gd/eES4 The empire rolls onward.
Working on our block captain system. Lots of work done, still so much more to do. There's always more to do. Heaven help us all...
Done shoveling the driveway and walking the dog. Time for FHE, then gotta read a bunch for my upcoming class.
Checking out http://tweetweather.com - aggregates local tweets about weather-related stuff, in addition to a main weather status update.
Lesson learned from tonight's crazy commute: go potty before getting in the car. No mishaps, but boy was I ready to get home...
Took me two hours to get home. 5x longer than normal.
Sloooooooooooooow.......
Going 10mph I-15 NB exit 269
Traffic alert: jacknife has been cleared, all lanes now open in AF. http://tinyurl.com/99ehn8
